item.title: Dan Houser Inks Audible Deal for Sci-Fi Thriller ‘A Better Paradise’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The Rockstar Games co-founder’s novel has set actor Ray Porter to narrate the audiobook, which hails from Houser’s Absurd Ventures.
